item.title: The BenQ interactive flat panel simplifies education and collaboration
item.description:
BenQ, a well-known name in digital light processing (DLP) and interactive displays, introduces the RP750K, a new interactive flat panel (IFP). This innovative IFP offers a comprehensive solution by combining a 4K Ultra HD whiteboard with annotation and collaboration tools. The RP750K excels in dynamic classroom or corporate training settings. Its Germ-Resistant Screen, infused with a safe and robust nano-ionic silver coating, effectively eliminates most surface germs, reducing cross-infection risks. This antimicrobial protection persists even with regular cleaning and extended use...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-benq-interactive-flat-panel-simplifies-education-and-collaboration/

item.title: Digital advertising measurement in Singapore is not meeting expectations
item.description:
Source: IAB Singapore. A new study by the Interactive Advertising Bureau (IAB) Singapore, titled “State of Digital Measurement in Singapore,” reveals that senior marketers believe digital advertising measurement in Singapore is lagging behind. The study shows that senior marketers rate the sophistication of digital measurement in Singapore at an average of four out of ten, with ten representing the level of advanced markets. Mobile measurement is identified as the most significant area needing improvement...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/digital-advertising-measurement-in-singapore-is-not-meeting-expectations/

item.title: Epson introduces a new family of interactive projectors with 3LCD technology
item.description:
Source: Epson website; The EB-696Ui. Epson recently released the EB-600 series*, a new line of 3LCD projectors with advanced features. These features include ultra short throw projection at resolutions exceeding full HD, PC-free interactivity, and the first-ever seamless dual-screen interactivity. Designed for classrooms and businesses, the new EB-600 series projectors (EB-696Ui, EB-695Wi2, EB-685Wi, EB-685W3, and EB-680) provide a vibrant viewing experience. The series boasts WUXGA resolution (1,920 x 1,200), surpassing full HD, and a heightened brightness of 3,800 lumens...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/epson-introduces-a-new-family-of-interactive-projectors-with-3lcd-technology/
